name: Improving Ofab Weapons
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material - Type 18" "265322" 1h Edge, 2h Edge, Piercing #L "Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material - Type 34" "265324" 1h Blunt, 2h Blunt #L "Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material - Type 687" "265328" Rifle, Assault Rifle, Shotgun #L "Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material - Type 812" "265326" Pistol, SMG, Bow An Ofab Weapon (eg: #L "Ofab Shark Mk 1" "265068") ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material - Type 687 + an ofab weapon (eg: Ofab Shark Mk 1) = a Mk 2 Ofab Weapon (ie: #L "Ofab Shark Mk 2" "265075") Skills: | -- | ------------------------------ Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material - Type 687 + a Mk 2 ofab weapon (eg: Ofab Shark Mk 2) = a Mk 3 Ofab Weapon (eg: #L "Ofab Shark Mk 3" "265082") Skills: | -- | ------------------------------ Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material - Type 687 + a Mk 3 ofab weapon (eg: Ofab Shark Mk 3) = a Mk 4 Ofab Weapon (eg: #L "Ofab Shark Mk 4" "265089") Skills: | -- | ------------------------------ Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material - Type 687 + a Mk 4 ofab weapon (eg: Ofab Shark Mk 4) = a Mk 5 Ofab Weapon (eg: #L "Ofab Shark Mk 5" "265096") Skills: | -- | ------------------------------ Kyr'Ozch Bio-Material - Type 687 + a Mk 5 ofab weapon (eg: Ofab Shark Mk 5) = a Mk 6 Ofab Weapon (eg: #L "Ofab Shark Mk 6" "265103") Skills: | -- | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ These upgrades require no tradeskills. Simply combine the ofab piece with the bio-material and you're set. **NOTE** (taken from AOUniverse) The tradeskill process itself it pretty straightforward. The ql % needed to update a certain ql weapon is still unknown. It may be possible that each upgrade requires a different ql clump as well. For example, to update a ql 175 weapon from MK2-MK3, a ql 30 clump is needed.
